actions.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 399 - 2 (Roll no. 228).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing that the House make public in printed form all transcripts and other relevant documents from any House Administration Committee investigation of the House Post Office as soon as possible.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Requires: (1) the House of Representatives to make public in printed form all transcripts and other relevant documents from any House Administration committee investigation of the House Post Office as soon as possible; (2) the majority and minority leaders to each designate a Member to review the materials; and (3) such materials to be made public unless the designees agree to the contrary.

titles.title: Providing that the House make public in printed form all transcripts and other relevant documents from any House Administration Committee investigation of the House Post Office as soon as possible.
